numpy
scipy

[alldeps]
scikit-image
pyunlocbox
matplotlib
pyqtgraph
PyOpenGL

[alldeps:python_version < "3.5"]
PySide

[alldeps:python_version == "2.*"]
pyflann

[alldeps:python_version == "3.*"]
pyflann3

[alldeps:python_version >= "3.5"]
PyQt5

[doc]
sphinx
numpydoc
sphinxcontrib-bibtex
sphinx-rtd-theme

[pkg]
wheel
twine

[test]
flake8
coverage
coveralls
